content: Is there a web page for the upcoming connectathon in Madrid? What version of FHIR is being targeted for this connectathon? Is it the version published Mar 21, 2017 (3.0.0) listed here: http://hl7.org/fhir/directory.html?

John, The Madrid, May 2017 Connectathon15 page is located here - http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=FHIR_Connectathon_15.
Yes, the latest FHIR Release 3 version will be the one used (see the "Connectathon Organization" section).
